name: Euro Farmer Life Sim 3D
description:
Euro Farmer Life Sim 3D is the latest real farming simulator that will allow you to become a real farmer! Take yourself in an awesome open world and start enjoying this great farming simulator. Harvest different types of crops, manage your livestock - cows, sheeps, turkeys, pigs. Experience the farming life, transport woods, hays, etc...
Features:
- Realistic Vehicles and Machineries (tractors, combines, plows, harvesters, seeders, trailers, trucks,)
- Easy Tutorial
- Many Type of plants to harvest
- Visually manage your livestock (pigs, sheeps, cows, turkeys...)
- Next Generation Graphics
